description: This file contains C source code implementing various encoding functions, including buffer encoding, string encoding with XML entity handling, Base64 encoding and decoding, and related utility functions.

methods.name: int HDK_EncodeToBuffer(void * pEncodeCtx,char * pBuf,unsigned int cbBuf)
methods.description: Encodes data from a buffer into a target buffer, copying byte-by-byte.

methods.name: int HDK_EncodeString(HDK_EncodeFn pfnEncode,void * pEncodeCtx,char * pBuf,unsigned int cbBuf)
methods.description: Encodes a string for XML by escaping special characters into entities.

methods.name: int HDK_EncodeBase64(HDK_EncodeFn pfnEncode,void * pEncodeCtx,char * pBuf,unsigned int cbBuf,int * pState,int * pPrev)
methods.description: Encodes data into Base64 format, handling streaming/partial encoding with state.

methods.name: int HDK_EncodeBase64Done(HDK_EncodeFn pfnEncode,void * pEncodeCtx,int state,int prev)
methods.description: Finalizes Base64 encoding, adding padding as necessary.

methods.name: int HDK_DecodeBase64(HDK_EncodeFn pfnEncode,void * pEncodeCtx,char * pBuf,unsigned int cbBuf,int * pState,int * pPrev)
methods.description: Decodes Base64 data, handling whitespace and padding, streaming with state.

methods.name: int HDK_DecodeBase64Done(int state)
methods.description: Checks whether base64 decoding stream is complete or in a valid end state.
